definition: any person who is highly skilled in a particular field
details:
noun
- any person who is highly skilled in a particular field
= example: any person who is highly skilled in a particular field
- a class of 14th century Japanese who were trained in martial arts and were hired for espionage and assassinations
= example: a class of 14th century Japanese who were trained in martial arts and were hired for espionage and assassinations
- a member of the ninja who were trained in martial arts and hired for espionage or sabotage or assassinations
= example: a member of the ninja who were trained in martial arts and hired for espionage or sabotage or assassinations
